title: Textile, 1840s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
warp; 219 cm (86 1/2 in.) by weft (selvedge to selvedge): 85cm(33 1/2 in.)
Pattern: Height of repeat: 17 in ( 43 cm.)                                          As printing surface was wider than the fabric, about 1 inch of the repeat  is missing.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Frederick Holdsworth, Jr.
description: Diamond grid of floral rope containing 4 different scenes; hawking, hunting, and Tyrollean idyll.
